metadata.description: Encode a sentence in English into Pig Latin
metadata.task_prefix: Pig Latin looks just like English, but if an English word starts with a vowel you add -yay at the end of the word (ice -> iceyay); if it starts with consonants, you move them to end of the word and add -ay (prank -> ankpray); if it is capitalized, the Pig Latin word is capitalized as well (Maggie -> Aggiemay). Translate English into Pig Latin.

1.input: The volcano may erupt at any moment.
1.output: Ethay olcanovay aymay eruptay atay anyay omentmay.

2.input: She said that she was very thirsty.
2.output: Eshay aidsay atthay eshay asway eryvay irstythay.

3.input: She looked like she was terrified.
3.output: Eshay ookedlay ikelay eshay asway errifiedtay.

5.input: Tom is the toughest guy I know.
5.output: Omtay isay ethay oughesttay uygay Iay owknay.

6.input: Tom said that he thought that he might not be required to do that again.
6.output: Omtay aidsay atthay ehay oughtthay atthay ehay ightmay otnay ebay equiredray otay oday atthay againay.

7.input: I wish to talk to your daughter.
7.output: Iay ishway otay alktay otay ouryay aughterday.

8.input: Yanni headed out to the parking lot to meet up with his friends.
8.output: Anniyay eadedhay outay otay ethay arkingpay otlay otay eetmay upay ithway ishay iendsfray.

9.input: Are you the one who let the dog in?
9.output: Areay ouyay ethay oneay owhay etlay ethay ogday inay?

10.input: I know that Tom is a realist.
10.output: Iay owknay atthay Omtay isay ay ealistray.

12.input: Tom has no intention of apologizing to Mary.
12.output: Omtay ashay onay intentionay ofay apologizingay otay Arymay.

14.input: We are going there to see him.
14.output: Eway areay oinggay erethay otay eesay imhay.

15.input: The teacher had a negative image of me.
15.output: Ethay eachertay adhay ay egativenay imageay ofay emay.

16.input: Tom told me he thought Mary was glad that that was going to happen.
16.output: Omtay oldtay emay ehay oughtthay Arymay asway adglay atthay atthay asway oinggay otay appenhay.

17.input: Callers pass through an intensive screening before they are allowed to speak to the talk show host.
17.output: Allerscay asspay oughthray anay intensiveay eeningscray eforebay eythay areay alloweday otay eakspay otay ethay alktay owshay osthay.

18.input: Sami was trying to introduce Layla to one of his best friends.
18.output: Amisay asway ingtryay otay introduceay Aylalay otay oneay ofay ishay estbay iendsfray.

19.input: To philosophise is to learn how to die.
19.output: Otay ilosophisephay isay otay earnlay owhay otay ieday.

20.input: Sami asked for the money back.
20.output: Amisay askeday orfay ethay oneymay ackbay.

21.input: She turned out the light so as not to waste electricity.
21.output: Eshay urnedtay outay ethay ightlay osay asay otnay otay asteway electricityay.

26.input: Tom is feeling a little bit better today than he was yesterday.
26.output: Omtay isay eelingfay ay ittlelay itbay etterbay odaytay anthay ehay asway esterdayyay.

29.input: I carried Tom down two flights of stairs.
29.output: Iay arriedcay Omtay ownday otway ightsflay ofay airsstay.

33.input: Tom has gained ten kilos this year.
33.output: Omtay ashay ainedgay entay iloskay isthay earyay.

34.input: Do I have to go back there?
34.output: Oday Iay avehay otay ogay ackbay erethay?

35.input: I think Tom would be able to do that if he put his mind to it.
35.output: Iay inkthay Omtay ouldway ebay ableay otay oday atthay ifay ehay utpay ishay indmay otay itay.

37.input: Tom is hooked up to the machine.
37.output: Omtay isay ookedhay upay otay ethay achinemay.

38.input: I need to practice speaking French more often.
38.output: Iay eednay otay acticepray eakingspay Enchfray oremay oftenay.

39.input: Did Tom say anything to you about Mary?
39.output: Idday Omtay aysay anythingay otay ouyay aboutay Arymay?

40.input: There was a multiple collision on the highway.
40.output: Erethay asway ay ultiplemay ollisioncay onay ethay ighwayhay.

41.input: Tom and Mary say they never wanted to do that.
41.output: Omtay anday Arymay aysay eythay evernay antedway otay oday atthay.

42.input: Sami took Layla to take a shower.
42.output: Amisay ooktay Aylalay otay aketay ay owershay.

43.input: What do you think Tom and Mary are up to?
43.output: Atwhay oday ouyay inkthay Omtay anday Arymay areay upay otay?

45.input: He will sit for the entrance examination.
45.output: Ehay illway itsay orfay ethay entranceay examinationay.

46.input: He carries a bag on his back.
46.output: Ehay arriescay ay agbay onay ishay ackbay.

47.input: He said that he was wrong.
47.output: Ehay aidsay atthay ehay asway ongwray.

48.input: Tom stomped out of the room angrily.
48.output: Omtay ompedstay outay ofay ethay oomray angrilyay.

49.input: Do you have any rooms with a shower and toilet?
49.output: Oday ouyay avehay anyay oomsray ithway ay owershay anday oilettay?

52.input: Find out what kind of a person he is.
52.output: Indfay outay atwhay indkay ofay ay ersonpay ehay isay.

53.input: Tom knows exactly what it is.
53.output: Omtay owsknay exactlyay atwhay itay isay.

55.input: Can you tell me where the post office is?
55.output: Ancay ouyay elltay emay erewhay ethay ostpay officeay isay?

56.input: A lonely old man lives there.
56.output: Aay onelylay olday anmay iveslay erethay.

57.input: Our family doctor is a Canadian.
57.output: Ouray amilyfay octorday isay ay Anadiancay.

58.input: This will save you a lot of trouble.
58.output: Isthay illway avesay ouyay ay otlay ofay oubletray.

59.input: I thought you said that Tom and Mary were married.
59.output: Iay oughtthay ouyay aidsay atthay Omtay anday Arymay ereway arriedmay.

62.input: I had a lot of awards.
62.output: Iay adhay ay otlay ofay awardsay.

64.input: I know usually Tom is allowed to do whatever he wants to do.
64.output: Iay owknay usuallyay Omtay isay alloweday otay oday ateverwhay ehay antsway otay oday.

65.input: She had no sooner read his letter than she tore it up.
65.output: Eshay adhay onay oonersay eadray ishay etterlay anthay eshay oretay itay upay.

66.input: What person does everyone take off his hat to?
66.output: Atwhay ersonpay oesday everyoneay aketay offay ishay athay otay?

67.input: You must send the answer to the letter right away.
67.output: Ouyay ustmay endsay ethay answeray otay ethay etterlay ightray awayay.

68.input: Tom will be released from prison next month.
68.output: Omtay illway ebay eleasedray omfray isonpray extnay onthmay.

70.input: It is those who want to do important things that are free.
70.output: Itay isay osethay owhay antway otay oday importantay ingsthay atthay areay eefray.

71.input: Have you given Tom what he asked for?
71.output: Avehay ouyay ivengay Omtay atwhay ehay askeday orfay?

72.input: Sami has been fighting with Layla over child support.
72.output: Amisay ashay eenbay ightingfay ithway Aylalay overay ildchay upportsay.

73.input: I guess he is a bit unhappy.
73.output: Iay uessgay ehay isay ay itbay unhappyay.

74.input: The dog can be saved from its injuries.
74.output: Ethay ogday ancay ebay avedsay omfray itsay injuriesay.

76.input: Sami was smoking weed in public places.
76.output: Amisay asway okingsmay eedway inay ublicpay acesplay.

77.input: Tom said his life was in danger.
77.output: Omtay aidsay ishay ifelay asway inay angerday.

78.input: They want to build a hotel in proximity to the beach.
78.output: Eythay antway otay uildbay ay otelhay inay oximitypray otay ethay eachbay.

80.input: I threw a drink at him.
80.output: Iay ewthray ay inkdray atay imhay.

82.input: Tom told Mary that she should quit pretending to be interested.
82.output: Omtay oldtay Arymay atthay eshay ouldshay uitqay etendingpray otay ebay interesteday.

83.input: I must apologize for not having written for such a long time.
83.output: Iay ustmay apologizeay orfay otnay avinghay ittenwray orfay uchsay ay onglay imetay.

84.input: Your sister has a sense of beauty.
84.output: Ouryay istersay ashay ay ensesay ofay eautybay.

86.input: Tom is an extremely bright man.
86.output: Omtay isay anay extremelyay ightbray anmay.

87.input: Mary counted the remaining money in her bag.
87.output: Arymay ountedcay ethay emainingray oneymay inay erhay agbay.

88.input: Tom and Mary went to the lake together.
88.output: Omtay anday Arymay entway otay ethay akelay ogethertay.

90.input: Tom asked Mary if he could sit next to her.
90.output: Omtay askeday Arymay ifay ehay ouldcay itsay extnay otay erhay.

92.input: I am staying for another few weeks.
92.output: Iay amay ayingstay orfay anotheray ewfay eeksway.

95.input: Lack of sleep will make you do stupid things.
95.output: Acklay ofay eepslay illway akemay ouyay oday upidstay ingsthay.

96.input: Only a few children were in the park.
96.output: Onlyay ay ewfay ildrenchay ereway inay ethay arkpay.

98.input: Mary said she hopes Tom can do that.
98.output: Arymay aidsay eshay opeshay Omtay ancay oday atthay.

99.input: How long have you been a doctor here?
99.output: Owhay onglay avehay ouyay eenbay ay octorday erehay?
